title: Legor 2 - Free Brain Game
features: 100% free full version + no In-App purchases!
Award winning puzzle game with 15 levels of increasing difficulty!
Global leaderboards included - compare your score with other people all around the world!
description: Can you solve all 15 levels of increasing difficulty in this award winning high scores puzzle game?Build various shapes in this challenging high-scores puzzle game with 15 levels of increasing difficulty! The game contains global leaderboard, so don't forget to submit your score! Your score depends on your speed!How to play: Move the shapes with your finger, tap on them to rotate them! Fill all the empty slots as fast as possible!
